column5: For you LeBaron fans.  Specials and No Tax today

So no tax, but you can't use your club membership for any further discounts, lol.  So it's basically like every other day in the store for club members?  Sounds like a sale to me!  I wonder how many people will fall for it.
There are some specials lol  And it's 13% instead of 10.      Wow
I went today. Didn't see and deals that stuck out. Bass pro, however, looks like they may have a few good ones.
Just wait til Cabelas opens. Lets see the BPS deals then.  I cant wait for the battle.LOL
Just wait til Cabelas opens. Lets see the BPS deals then.  I cant wait for the battle.LOL OH Yaaaaaa

There were some deals to be had. My wife picked up a liner & merino wool sock combo for $10, picked up a pair of Baffin Chloe winter boots for $90 (Amazon sells them for $134), and I picked up a Zippo hand warmer (which doesn't seem to work...).  Aside from the Zippo hand warmer, it wasn't bad. Despite just being a no-tax event, some of their items are priced lower than other retailers.
